entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tobermory 9:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -19.0°C
Wind: NNW 24 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
